home.title: Welcome to my homepage
home.body: I am a senior full stack developer, with experience in the insurance BUSINESS (17 years), tourism (1 year), home automation (2 years), electronic signature and other online services (3 years). In various projects I also assumed the role of team lead.

skills.title: My skills
skills.body: I have both backend and frontend professional experience. From the management and optimization of business processes to the creation of complete web applications.

projects.title: Projects I worked on
projects.body: The projects I describe here have characteristics that reflect the business of the company where they were carried out. They have in common my pragmatic method focused on results. I have achieved the goal in every project and my references (which I can provide on request) can confirm it.
